segments.advisor_message: So, let’s talk about your assets for retirement. Do you have any specific items in mind that you’re considering?
segments.client_message: Um, well, I’ve got, like, this old car I used to drive—it's a classic so, y'know, I think it’s kinda special? I mean, I don’t really remember how much I paid for it, but it’s probably worth a lot more now? And then there’s this art stuff too, I think I have some nice pieces? Could be worth something, right? I just really want to make sure I kinda set everything up right for when I retire, right? Oh, and the value...I’m not sure of the exact numbers, like, uh, the current value or whatever, but it’s all about making it work out in the end for retirement, ya know?
